jparsec.io.device

Interface GenericWeatherStation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VirtualWeatherStation

    public interface GenericWeatherStation
    An interface for the commands that should be available to all weather stations.
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GenericWeatherStation.WEATHER_FORECAST
      The set of possible weather forecast values.
      static class  GenericWeatherStation.WEATHER_STATION_MODEL
      The set of weather stations supported.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageHeaderElement[] getFitsHeader()
      Returns the fits header describing the status of this weather station.
      GenericWeatherStation.WEATHER_FORECAST[] getForecastInFollowingDays()
      Returns the weather forecast for the following days.
      double getHumidity()
      Returns the humidity between 0 and 100, from the sensor outside.
      double getHumidityInside()
      Returns the humidity between 0 and 100, from the sensor inside.
      double getPressure()
      Returns the pressure in mbar.
      double getTemperature()
      Returns the temperature in C from the sensor outside.
      double getTemperatureInside()
      Returns the temperature in C from the sensor inside.
      double getWindDirection()
      Returns the wind direction.
      double getWindSpeed()
      Returns the wind speed in m/s.
      boolean hasInsideSensors()
      Returns if this station contains sensors inside, besides outside.
      boolean isRaining()
      Returns if it is raining or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getTemperature

        double getTemperature()
        Returns the temperature in C from the sensor outside.
        Returns:
        Temperature in C.

      • getTemperatureInside

        double getTemperatureInside()
        Returns the temperature in C from the sensor inside.
        Returns:
        Temperature in C.

      • getPressure

        double getPressure()
        Returns the pressure in mbar.
        Returns:
        Pressure in mbar.

      • getHumidity

        double getHumidity()
        Returns the humidity between 0 and 100, from the sensor outside.
        Returns:
        Humidity, from 0 to 100.

      • getHumidityInside

        double getHumidityInside()
        Returns the humidity between 0 and 100, from the sensor inside.
        Returns:
        Humidity, from 0 to 100.

      • getWindSpeed

        double getWindSpeed()
        Returns the wind speed in m/s.
        Returns:
        Wind speed.

      • getWindDirection

        double getWindDirection()
        Returns the wind direction.
        Returns:
        Wind's direction azimuth, 0 is north.

      • isRaining

        boolean isRaining()
        Returns if it is raining or not.
        Returns:
        True or false.

      • hasInsideSensors

        boolean hasInsideSensors()
        Returns if this station contains sensors inside, besides outside.
        Returns:
        True or false.

      • getForecastInFollowingDays

        GenericWeatherStation.WEATHER_FORECAST[] getForecastInFollowingDays()
        Returns the weather forecast for the following days. This can be an implementation using of web service. First index is for today.
        Returns:
        Values for weather forecast for today and (possibly) more days. Null is returned in case this is not supported.

      • getFitsHeader

        ImageHeaderElement[] getFitsHeader()
        Returns the fits header describing the status of this weather station. The set of entries are: 
         Entry        Value (typical)   Description
 ------------------------------------------
 
 TEMP         10                Temperature (C) outside
 PRES         1010              Pressure (mbar) outside
 HUM          50                Humidity % (0-100) outside
 TEMP_IN      20                Temperature (C) inside
 HUM_IN        0                Humidity % (0-100) inside
 WIND_SP       5                Wind speed (m/s)
 WIND_AZ       0                Wind direction (azimuth, deg)
 RAIN          false            Is raining ?
        Returns:
        The set of entries for the fits header.
